# Overview
Reformat raster values for EE

# Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(foreign)
```

```{r}
canopy16 = raster("../data/TM16_CanPer/TM16_CanPer.tif")
canopy16
```
```{r}
class(canopy16[1])
```

```{r}
str(canopy16)
```
```{r}

dataType(canopy16)
```
```{r}
s <- writeRaster(canopy16, '../outputs/TMCanopy2016INT2U.tif', datatype='INT2U', overwrite=TRUE)
dataType(s)
```
```{r}
plot(s)
```
```{r}
str(s)
```
